response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and profitability. Given its immense value to you, we are offering it at a special introductory price of $1,100,000. This exclusive offer is designed to ensure you receive the best possible return on your investment while maximizing the benefits of this exceptional product. We are confident that it will exceed your expectations and contribute substantially to your company's growth. Please let us know if you have any questions or require further information. We look forward to discussing how this product can revolutionize your business.", "product_price": 1100000}
